name: SmartFinancial, Inc.
description: SmartFinancial, Inc. is a leading bank holding company headquartered in Knoxville, Tennessee. Founded in 2015, the company operates through its wholly-owned bank subsidiary, SmartBank, which provides a wide range of financial services to individuals and businesses throughout the southeastern United States. SmartFinancial focuses on community banking, offering traditional banking products such as checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages, as well as business banking services. The company prides itself on its commitment to exceptional customer service, innovative banking solutions, and community involvement. SmartBank has rapidly expanded its footprint through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, establishing a strong presence in markets including Florida, Georgia, and Alabama. With a vision to enhance the financial well-being of its customers, SmartFinancial aims to deliver personalized banking experiences, leveraging technology to streamline operations and improve client interactions. The company is also dedicated to supporting local communities through various initiatives and charitable contributions. As a publicly traded entity, SmartFinancial continues to explore opportunities for growth while maintaining its core values of integrity, excellence, and community service.
